recipesJson.name: Ron and Jammy
recipesJson.author: hamglaze
recipesJson.description:
FLV Boysenberry, PUR Boysenberry Preserves, and FLV Jammy Berry form the "berry trinity" of this recipe. RF (SC) Lemon and FLV Lemonade bring an authentic lemon flavor that is also somewhat sweet. Finally, VT Fizzy Sherbert and CAP Super Sweet back up the Lemonade and Jammy Berry respectively.

I get a sweet, light berry from the inhale and lemon on the exhale.

reviews.text: That’s delightful AF. It’s like mixing a big spoonful of boysenberry jam with a smaller spoonful of lemon marmalade but not really stirring it up very well, so you get more of the berry jam at first and more of the lemon marmalade later, but some of both throughout. I suppose the lemon could be a little more natural and less sugar-coated lollipopish if I wanted to get nitpicky (have you tried INW Lemon Mix, that might do it if you’re really interested in authentic lemon). But I don’t really want to do that because it’s so enjoyable just the way it is, and manages to be remarkably refreshing for something so sweet.
